name: Curves
description:
"Curves" is inspired by the winter sports skeleton. Try to make the difference in milliseconds on the track.

*Physics-based Hoverboard.
-It moves smoothly along the terrain.

*Physics-based character.
-A physical animation that is transformed by movement.

*Can get out of track.
-Out of the track, the game doesn't end. Take a breath for a while.

*Day and night.
-Curves Island has day and night. Sunrise and sunset will be a joy.

*Record Competition.
-You can compete with users around the world.

*Reward System.
-You will be rewarded with costumes. when you break through the records in the race or find hidden treasures on the island.

*Costumes.
-Various kinds of costumes can be acquired and changed in the game.
